name: mrcrsp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 = c2, (ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wceq(c1, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring →(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod)
⊣ ((ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod → c1 = c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wceq(c1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring →(ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod)
⊣ ((ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod → c1 = c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wceq(c1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = c2)
⊣ ((ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod → c1 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((ringLMod ` c0)∈ LMod → c1 = c2)
⊣ c3 =(LSubSp `(ringLMod ` c0))
⊣ c1 =(LSpan `(ringLMod ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(mrCls ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, cfv(crglmod, c0)))

-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c3))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ c3 =(LSubSp `(ringLMod ` c0))
⊣ c1 =(LSpan `(ringLMod ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(mrCls ` c3)

stmt.origin: eqtri(c3, cfv(clss, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cfv(clidl, c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c3, cfv(clss, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clidl, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(clidl, c0), cfv(clss, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c3 =(LSubSp `(ringLMod ` c0))
⊣ c3 =(LIdeal ` c0)
⊣ (LIdeal ` c0)=(LSubSp `(ringLMod ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))

⊣ c3 =(LIdeal ` c0)

stmt.origin: eqtri(c1, cfv(clspn, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cfv(crsp, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Moore closure generalizes ideal span. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
